table.caption: Psychic Wind Location Effects
rows: Diverted; add {@dice 1d6} days to travel time
Blown astray; add {@dice 3d10} days to travel time
Lost; at the end of the travel time, the characters arrive at a location other than the intended destination
Sent through a random color pool (roll on the {@book Astral Color Pools|XDMG|5|Astral Color Pools} table)
table.name: Psychic Wind Location Effects
